sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 467.003 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:

sections.heading: Licensed midwives; qualifications; endorsement; temporary certificates.
Fees
sections.text: 467.0135 Fees.—The department shall establish fees for application, examination, initial licensure, renewal of licensure, licensure by endorsement, inactive status, delinquent status, and reactivation of an inactive license. The appropriate fee must be paid at the time of application and is payable to the Department of Health, in accordance with rules adopted by the department. A fee is nonrefundable, unless otherwise provided by rule. A fee may not exceed:

sections.heading: Exceptions
sections.text: 467.207 Exceptions.—No provision of this chapter shall be construed to prohibit:
